As a clinician, I can create telehealth bookings (video/face-to-face) for any service type
As a user, a floating 'Talk with a Doctor' chat widget is visible on every authenticated page
As a user, messages go to Dr. Alex (loaded from DR_ALEX_SOUL.md) with optional case context
As a user, Book Telehealth header button opens a context-aware booking form (auto-fills on case pages)
As a user, when Dr. Alex suggests seeing a doctor, a Book Telehealth button appears inline in chat
As a worker, I receive a magic link and complete my health questionnaire without logging in
As an employer, I create a pre-employment assessment and send the magic link email to the worker
As a clinician, AI generates a structured clearance report after questionnaire submission
As an employer, I receive an auto-email when a worker is CLEARED or CLEARED_WITH_CONDITIONS
As Jacinta, I receive an alert email when AI flags a worker as REQUIRES_REVIEW or NOT_CLEARED
As a case manager, I can view a worker's full history: assessments, cases, and bookings on one page

technicalNotes: Workers table: normalized FK target for cases, assessments, and bookings
Magic link: crypto.randomBytes(32).toString('hex') stored as accessToken
Public routes (/api/public/*) have no authorize() middleware
Dr. Alex soul loaded from config/DR_ALEX_SOUL.md at server startup via readFileSync
SUGGEST_BOOKING signal stripped from AI response text, returned as suggestBooking: true flag
ChatWidget lazy-imports BookingModal to avoid circular dependency
reportGenerator accepts full assessment object (not ID) to avoid empty orgId lookup
Alert emails sent to jacinta@preventli.ai via existing sendEmail() from emailService.ts
Claude model: claude-haiku-4-5-20251001
businessImpact: Workers can complete health checks without creating an account
Employers get automated clearance emails — no manual follow-up
Dr. Alex provides 24/7 health guidance and triages to telehealth when needed
Jacinta alerted instantly for complex or flagged assessments
Full worker history in one normalized data model

features.description: chat_memory table stores conversation history per case or worker. Dr. Alex loads last 8 messages before each response and saves new exchanges fire-and-forget. Memory scoped to caseId or workerId context.

As a clinician, Dr. Alex remembers worker-specific context when I'm on a worker's profile page

technicalNotes: chat_memory table: id, organization_id, case_id (nullable), worker_id (nullable), role, content, created_at
getChatMemory({ caseId?, workerId? }, limit=8)  returns oldest-first
saveChatMessage(data)  fire-and-forget insert, non-blocking
Memory injected between SOUL and contextBlock in system prompt
Memory key: caseId context  caseId key, workerId context  workerId key, no context  no memory
